18.09.2014.

The final thing for this year’s WebCamp Conference left to be published is the conference schedule. This year’s format is one keynote, 36 talks in 2 parallel tracks over 2 conference days, and a recruitment session with our sponsors, for all of you looking for new opportunities. Full schedule »
